content:
Testing the can bus.

I have implemented can communication, two RPis which can send and receive forth and back However, not yet ready for my yacht (can bus at bottom)
can.jpg

>Testing the can bus.

Nice.. I have something similar at home. The wires are blocking sight. What's the HAT you're using?
a waveshare, cheap. Contains a 485 port as well which I dont use.
4 messages were moved here from #Master - 5.8.0 (was: comms) > flatpak concurrency by Alec Leamas.
Are you using the same? For me it was not just about price but also availability, a lot of stuff is hard to get.

No I've not used that but another board with the same kind of circuit , MCP2515. GeDaD MCS Marine Control Server. Works fine but not as cheap since there are a lot other stuff included. But I think I'll try "your" little nice one later on.
